noun.description: An inhabitant of the ancient kingdom of Judah.

adjective.description: Of or relating to the kingdom or tribe of Judah.

origin: Early 18th century; earliest use found in Rehearsal. From Judah (Hebrew yĕhūḏāh), the name of one of the twelve tribes of Israel and of the ancient Hebrew kingdom of Judah + -ite, ultimately after Hebrew yĕhūḏī.
